Boston.Our Lady of Good Voyage:
The Our Lady of Good Voyage is a Roman Catholic church located at 51 Seaport Boulevard in South Boston, Massachusetts. The shrine has 250 seats and holds Mass twice daily.


== History ==
The church was built between 2016 - 17 to replace the Our Lady of Good Voyage chapel, on Northern Avenue that was built in 1952 as a place for workers on the Boston waterfront to pray.
